dialogue.content: Im doing whats called modern trolling
My idea is that modern rage bait is the same as internet trolling where its trying to piss you off
Like theres all kinds of super entitled people, police brutality, and other estranged things online right
They are all trying to make you mad
So we are trolling ourselves by viewing them
You might have been watching too many tiktoks lately buddy
Cant you humor me a little even
Dude i just knocked over an alignment lens and its gonna take 2 days to realign the system my profs gonna kill me
